basics.name: Raúl García Fernández
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with more than 6 years of experience
basics.summary: +6 years of experience as a Full Stack developer with experience in web development, mobile and desktop applications, I specialize in creating comprehensive solutions that range from the user interface to the database. My approach focuses on building efficient and attractive applications and websites, ensuring that each project meets quality and functionality standards.

work.name: DIP Mariel
work.summary: Development of an application for Windows, DipProy , is focused on Documentation Management for engineers on the job site.

work.name: GoSeeClient
work.summary: Development of the GoSeeClient mobile application . This application seeks to organize, monitor and facilitate secure and constant communication with the clients of a specific entrepreneur. Flutter + Dart and SQLite were used for data management. Maintenance and update on course.

work.name: NEXTGEN
work.summary: Back- end development of the web application. We worked with NodeJS - Express and MongoDB. During this process, the Hexagonal and Vertical Slice programming architecture was learned and applied . Maintenance and update in progress.

work.name: Travel with Me
work.summary: Viaja Conmigo is an innovative mobile application designed for Cuban travel agencies. This digital tool optimizes the management of public transportation, transportation providers and cargo services, providing an integrated and efficient travel experience. With Viaja Conmigo, Users can plan and book trips quickly and easily, from the convenience of their mobile device. The application offers a complete platform for booking management, including taxis, trains and other means of transport, and provides real-time information on schedules, routes and availability of services. In addition, it focuses on the customer experience, offering personalized customer service and secure and convenient payment options.

work.name: E'Gustazo Cubano
work.summary: E' Gustazo Cubano is an innovative mobile application designed specifically for small and medium-sized businesses (MSMEs) in Cuba that market food products, household appliances and more. The application offers a digital platform that facilitates business management, allowing users reach a wide audience of consumers. With E' Gustazo Cubano, businesses can showcase their product catalog, establish a strong and attractive online presence, and facilitate secure and efficient transactions. Additionally, the application promotes authenticity and Cuban culture, providing a window to Cuban gastronomy and crafts for a broader audience.
